text:
I was so looking forward to dinner here last Sunday. We ordered 6 dishes. The fried rice was hard. The steamed fish was not hot in fact the gravy was lukewarm. The fried
yam ring had a milky taste to it. All in all, the dinner didn’t speak joy. I spent $97 for 2 pax. Disappointing meal. But what to do? Haha…
Have a wonderful lunch with family members here. Food are very affordable and the portion are big. Recommended to get the set dishes if you are dining as a family.
We ordered a set menu for 6pax. The portion is very generous and we couldn't even finish the dessert. The taste is all good.

A cosy vegetarian restaurant in the heartland of Kovan/Serangoon. They undergone a revamp in recent months, I believe, and they have an updated menu with different food presentations. The staff are friendly in general and willing to be of kind service. Food comes at a reasonable cost given the location and upkeep of the place. Come and try if you are ever in the area, or just craving vegetarian food!

We celebrated our year-end dinner at Greenland Vegetarian, which offered a cozy ambiance. We ordered three dishes and their signature Fried Kway Teow, all of which were delicious and generously portioned, even in the small size. We look forward to returning to try more options.
